name: Fields XY
description: Introducing Fields XY a puzzle platformer featuring 3 unique characters, all interacting at once to complete levels both simple and complex.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 (Vista if you so wish) Processor: Dual core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Speakers or Headphones Additional Notes: Disk space may vary
